Obstruction 2: Andrea’s Shoot

Oct 27, 2007

I talked about my shoot last weekend for the 5 Obstructions video class. Here are some pictures I took crewing for Andrea Lira.  She crewed for me, and I crewed for her the following day.  Nacho was the faithful actor.
